thread.title: Perfect base for our trip to Rome -
thread.title_full: Perfect base for our trip to Rome - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mick C
title: Perfect base for our trip to Rome -
text:
Perfectly situated for a visit to Rome, this hotel has extremely welcoming and helpful staff from the minute we arrived, very comfortable spacious rooms with good air-con/heat control and a great breakfast room with a fresh selection of food for any nationality.
We had a double room with our 3 daughters in an adjacent room which was big enough for all 5 of us to get together for a drink and a chat before and after heading out.
Room Tip: This is a City Hotel, so has rooms that have no windows to the outside Maybe book early and request... See more room tips
